official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the maintenance of social security benefit levels.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that current social security beneficiaries shall not have their benefits reduced below the present benefit level.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the maintenance of social security benefit levels.
